column4: what do i need to do to get my headphone's jack working on my laptop
anyone know any tips to help get my headphone's jack working
could you include a bit more detail?
please download http://hg.alsa-project.org/alsa/raw-file/tip/alsa-info.sh and save it to your Desktop.  Then, in a Terminal, run it using `bash ~/Desktop/alsa-info.sh'
in a Terminal: echo options snd-hda-intel model=lenovo|sudo tee -a /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base-test
after you do that, please reboot
was it suppose to tell me something?
did you reboot after typing that entire command?
and yes, it echoes the command back to you
err, without DMA support for some SATA controllers?  likely.  without DMA support for /all/ SATA?  no.
i cant find any were online where people are having success with dma on sata drives?
